SELECT TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY') "year"
,TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM') "month"
,TO_CHAR(PAYMENT_DATE, 'DD') "date"
,SUM(ORDER_PAYMENT) "sumSales" ,SUM(TICKET_CTN) "sumTicket"
,SUM(ORDER_PAYMENT) / 12 "avgSales"
,AVG(ORDER_PAYMENT) "avgSales"
,AVG(TICKET_CTN) "avgTicket" ,MAX(ORDER_PAYMENT) "maxSales" ,MAX(TICKET_CTN) "maxTicket" ,MIN(ORDER_PAYMENT) "minSales" ,MIN(TICKET_CTN) "minTicket" FROM TB_GROUP G, TICKET_ORDER_DETAIL TOD, TICKET_ORDER O WHERE G.GROUP_CODE LIKE 'TICK%' AND G.CODE = TOD.TICKET_TYPE AND TOD.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO AND ORDER_STATUS = 2 AND TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY') = #{year}
AND TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM') = #{month}
AND TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'DD') = #{date}
GROUP BY TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY')
,TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM')
,TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'DD')

SELECT
COALESCE(T2.MONTH, T1.LV) "period"
COALESCE(T2.DT, T1.LV) "period"
, COALESCE(T2.CODE, T1.CODE) "ticketCode" , COALESCE(T2.CODE_NAME, T1.CODE_NAME) "ticketType" , COALESCE(T2.SUM_PRICE, 0) "sumSales" , ( SELECT
CASE WHEN #{year} = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) THEN SUM(TOD.TICKET_PRICE * TOD.TICKET_CTN * (1 - NVL(TOD.DISCOUNT, 0))) / EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) ELSE SUM(ORDER_PAYMENT)/12 END
AVG(TOD.TICKET_PRICE * TOD.TICKET_CTN * (1 - NVL(TOD.DISCOUNT, 0)))
FROM TB_GROUP G LEFT JOIN TICKET_ORDER_DETAIL TOD ON (G.CODE = TOD.TICKET_TYPE) LEFT JOIN TICKET_ORDER O ON (TOD.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO) WHERE GROUP_CODE LIKE 'TICK%' AND EXTRACT(YEAR FROM O.PAYMENT_DATE) = #{year}
AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM O.PAYMENT_DATE) = #{month}
AND G.CODE = T1.CODE GROUP BY G.CODE, G.CODE_NAME ) "yearAvgSales" FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT LPAD(LEVEL, 2, 0) LV FROM DUAL
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= CASE WHEN #{year} = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') THEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'MM')) ELSE 12 END
CONNECT BY LEVEL <= CASE WHEN #{year} || #{month} = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMM') THEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'DD')) ELSE EXTRACT(DAY FROM LAST_DAY(#{year} || #{month} || '01')) END
), (SELECT CODE, CODE_NAME FROM TB_GROUP WHERE GROUP_CODE LIKE 'TICK%') ) T1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT
MONTH
DT
,CODE, CODE_NAME, SUM(PRICE) SUM_PRICE, AVG(PRICE) AVG_PRICE FROM ( SELECT G.CODE, G.CODE_NAME ,TOD.TICKET_CTN, TOD.TICKET_PRICE * TOD.TICKET_CTN * (1-NVL(TOD.DISCOUNT, 0)) PRICE ,TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM') MONTH
,TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'DD') DT
FROM TB_GROUP G JOIN TICKET_ORDER_DETAIL TOD ON (G.CODE = TOD.TICKET_TYPE) JOIN TICKET_ORDER O ON (TOD.ORDER_NO = O.ORDER_NO AND O.ORDER_STATUS = 2) WHERE GROUP_CODE LIKE 'TICK%' AND TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'YYYY') = #{year}
AND TO_CHAR(O.PAYMENT_DATE, 'MM') = #{month}
) GROUP
BY MONTH, CODE, CODE_NAME
BY DT, CODE, CODE_NAME
ORDER
BY MONTH, CODE_NAME
BY DT, CODE_NAME
) T2
ON (T1.LV = T2.MONTH AND T1.CODE = T2.CODE )
ON (T1.LV = T2.DT AND T1.CODE = T2.CODE )
ORDER BY "period", "ticketCode"
